name: BouncyBoom
description:
!HARDEST GAME EVER! What is BouncyBoom ?

BouncyBoom is a 2D platformer game that can make you go insane in less then 5 minutes.

Bombs are falling from the sky and dodging is the single option to stay alive .As the rockets are falling the platform you are staying on is being destroyed.

In order to win the game you need to survive 120 seconds (2 minutes) .... it is hard and frustrating but not impossible. 

With all that said ,  good luck player !

Controls: go leftago rightdjumpauto jump
